Class dtai.gwt.SpecialFont 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----java.awt.Font
           |
           +----dtai.gwt.SpecialFont
public abstract class SpecialFont
extends Font
SpecialFont is an abstract class through which GWT can support self-rendered fonts (like those used for SignWriting for the deaf).

SpecialFont(String, int, int)

drawString(GadgetGraphics, String, int, int)
getMetrics()

SpecialFont 
 public SpecialFont(String fontName,
                    int fontStyle,
                    int fontSize)

getMetrics 
 public abstract SpecialFontMetrics getMetrics()
drawString

                                 String str,
                                 int x,
                                 int y)
